Text: Interesting for me as it's Mike Mignola's early days as the artist on this series, as he rarely draws anything else other than Hellboy now. Thanks very much for this! :D

The -1 hurts me dearly, even though I thrive on constructive criticism.  If you could tell me what aspect of this torrent warranted the negative appraisal, I would appreciate your feedback, and mayhaps not make the same mistake in the future.  Thank you ahead of time...
